Detailed Description

An interpolation method that uses 1/r^2.

Author:
Valliappa.Lakshmanan

Override double edu.ou.asgbook.oban.CressmanWeighting.computeWt ( double  latdist,
double  londist 
) [virtual]

Subclasses implement a weighting function.

If -ve value is returned, then the point will be considered too far away and not used in weighting.

Implements edu.ou.asgbook.oban.WeightFunction.

00032                                                            {
00033         double r2 = latdist * latdist + londist * londist;
00034         if ( r2 > R2 ){
00035             return INVALID_WEIGHT;
00036         }
00037         double factor = r2/R2;
00038         return (1 - factor)/(1 + factor);
00039     }

00042         PointObservations data = DailyRainfall.read(DailyRainfall.TN_Oct2010);

00044         double meansep = ObjectiveAnalysisUtils.computeMeanDistance(data);
00045         System.out.println("Objectively analyzing " + data.getPoints().length + " pts with a mean separation of " + meansep);
00046         WeightFunction wtFunc = new CressmanWeighting(3*meansep);

00048

00052         System.out.println("Took " + (System.nanoTime() - startTime)/(1000*1000.0*1000) + " seconds");
00053
